highlights: Built a production-ready authentication template using Ruby on Rails and Devise, providing secure user registration, login, logout, and session management out of the box.
Implemented password recovery and persistent sessions with time-limited reset tokens, remember-me functionality, and encrypted cookie-based sessions.
Secured authentication flows with BCrypt password hashing, CSRF protection, strong parameter sanitization, and configurable account lockout and confirmation features.
Integrated a modern, responsive UI using Bootstrap 5 and Hotwire (Turbo + Stimulus), enabling fast page transitions and customizable Devise views.
